CategoryServiceUpdateCategoryBody.title: UpdateCategoryRequest is used to update a category

ExerciseHistoryServiceUpdateExerciseHist.title: UpdateExerciseHistoryRequest is used to update an exercise history entry

ExerciseServiceAddExerciseImageBody.title: AddExerciseImageRequest is used to add an image to an exercise

ExerciseServiceAddExerciseLinkBody.title: AddExerciseLinkRequest is used to add a link to an exercise

ExerciseServiceUpdateExerciseBody.title: UpdateExerciseRequest is used to update an exercise

PracticeSessionServiceAddSessionExercise.title: AddSessionExerciseRequest is used to add an exercise to a session

PracticeSessionServiceUpdatePracticeSess.title: UpdatePracticeSessionRequest is used to update a practice session

PracticeSessionServiceUpdateSessionExerc.title: UpdateSessionExerciseRequest is used to update a session exercise

TagServiceUpdateTagBody.title: UpdateTagRequest is used to update a tag

v1BpmProgressPoint.title: BpmProgressPoint represents a point in the BPM progress chart

v1CategoryTimeDistribution.title: CategoryTimeDistribution shows how much time was spent on each category

v1CreateCategoryRequest.title: CreateCategoryRequest is used to create a new category

v1CreateExerciseHistoryRequest.title: CreateExerciseHistoryRequest is used to create a new exercise history entry

v1CreateExerciseRequest.title: CreateExerciseRequest is used to create a new exercise

v1CreatePracticeSessionRequest.title: CreatePracticeSessionRequest is used to create a new practice session

v1CreateTagRequest.title: CreateTagRequest is used to create a new tag

v1ExerciseHistory.title: ExerciseHistory represents a historical record of exercise performance

v1ExerciseImage.title: ExerciseImage represents an image associated with an exercise

v1ExerciseLink.title: ExerciseLink represents an external link for an exercise

v1ExerciseStats.title: ExerciseStats contains statistics for an exercise

v1ExerciseTimeDistribution.title: ExerciseTimeDistribution shows how much time was spent on each exercise

v1ListCategoriesResponse.title: ListCategoriesResponse contains a list of categories and pagination info

v1ListExerciseHistoryResponse.title:
ListExerciseHistoryResponse contains a list of exercise history entries and
pagination info

v1ListExercisesResponse.title: ListExercisesResponse contains a list of exercises and pagination info

v1ListPracticeSessionsResponse.title:
ListPracticeSessionsResponse contains a list of practice sessions and
pagination info

v1ListTagsResponse.title: ListTagsResponse contains a list of tags and pagination info

v1PracticeSession.title: PracticeSession represents a drumming practice session

v1PracticeStats.title: PracticeStats contains statistics for practice sessions

v1PracticeTimePoint.title: PracticeTimePoint represents a point in the practice frequency chart

v1SessionExercise.title: SessionExercise represents an exercise performed during a practice session

v1SessionExerciseInput.title: SessionExerciseInput is used for creating session exercises

v1Tag.title: Tag represents a tag used for categorizing exercises
